summary: Feature request to improve error messages when invalid arguments are passed to client.workflow.start(). Currently shows opaque error for incorrect args format (object instead of array).
userImpact: Users receive confusing error messages when passing incorrectly formatted arguments to workflow.start(), making debugging difficult.
proposedFix: Throw a clear error message like 'args must be an array' when invalid argument types are passed.
resolutionDetails: Marked as no longer pertinent by maintainer - likely resolved in subsequent updates or determined to be out of scope.
keyQuote: Throw an error like `args must be an array`
